Name: LU 185 - Zoning, Port Authority Bus Terminal Replacement, Manhattan (N 240354 ZRM)
Title: Application number N 240354 ZRM (Port Authority Bus Terminal Replacement) submitted by The Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying Article VII, Chapter 4 (Special Permits by the City Planning Commission), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 4, Council District 3.

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
